description:
Ash`s Infernape was revealed during the Japanese opening `The Greatest-Everyday!`. It evolved a few episodes after the airing of opening in DP163.
During a battle against Barry, Monferno was hit by Empoleon`s Hydro Cannon and was sent flying into the nearby forest. When Team Rocket captured the Pok√©mon and were about to get away, Monferno returned in rage and began destroying their mecha.
Ash managed to stop Monferno, but while Paul`s Electabuzz was holding the broken mecha up, it couldn`t hold it any longer and Monferno came to the rescue. While it was rescuing Piplup, Empoleon and Pikachu, it evolved into Infernape.
name: Goukazaru (Satoshi)
